column4: When an application is asking you a set of questions with Y and N... how can you tell it y and then auto accept Y for all remaining questions so I dont have to continuously press Y
pipe the output from the 'yes' command into it
I dont understand... im in the middle of it right now.... its saying Y/n, Y/n.... how do I pipe it?
yes, for my method, you would have to restart the program.  I don't know of another way.  I would assume what you are asking is totally dependent on the program
